Articles.Content:
When an A-class asteroid is discovered that will hit Kerbin in just two weeks, Andrew Kerman is convinced they can simply redirect it. But instead, the space program decides to evacuate the planet! Will their efforts be in vain? Join the Kerbals in this award-winning* film on their epic journey to evacuate Kerbin!

-Video description.

*This film has won the "Amazing Film" reward by... me!
Great design man! Here, take some rep and do more Cinematics! Go on...
Thanks Nahim, I really appreciate it! This was a lot of work, but I do plan to do more cinematics, even if they're a bit lighter on the VFX.

Very nice! Personally, I was expecting something a little more serious, but that made it even better when the giant rovers went trundling towards the pad. By the way, how many Kerbals were on there? Kerbin's population seems a little low...

By the way, how many Kerbals were on there? Kerbin's population seems a little low...

I think it was around 50 or so Kerbals, however, the base on Tylo only had room for 20 or so, so many of them would have to wait in orbit longer until the colony built more housing.

As of now, the only buildings we have on Kerbin are in the space center, so I just assumed that there wouldn't be too many Kerbals. But I agree with you - it does make you wonder.

The other option is that the space program helped as many Kerbals evacuate as possible, but not everyone could make it. I like the first option better though. Squad, please don't add more buildings to KSC.
